tool_description: Provided a latitude and longitude, return the nearest state/province coastline distance line to the given point
name: Distance to Coast by Point
title: Distance to Coast by Point

api_list.name: Distance to Coast by Point
api_list.description: Return nearest three coastlines from the given point.  Request lines : true for coastline shapes and distance line to return.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://distance-to-coast-by-point1.p.rapidapi.com/distance-to-coast-point"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distance-to-coast-by-point1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://distance-to-coast-by-point1.p.rapidapi.com/distance-to-coast-point"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distance-to-coast-by-point1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
